title: How to "borrow" a amount of RP? If we need it
body: yes, If i need 65 RP, then what should I do, or must to do?

replies.body:
I've never heard of "borrowing" RP, but I think we may be able to help you out if you reach out via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

It may be a few days before you hear back from us on your ticket, as we've been pretty busy lately, but we'll reach out as soon as we can. Let me know if you have any other questions.

You can send in a ticket to riot asking for the one-per-lifetime rp gift. Chances are better if you submit a drawing of your favorite RP champion (no artistic skill required, just some effort to show that you tried)

they also have the right to refuse if they believe the amount being asked for is too high (I don't remember what their general limit was but i THIIIIIIIIIIIIINK 65 should fall under the OK amount)
